title: Flashare
author: Flashare
content: We're the first fundraising platform built on Polygon that allows people to get funded with less than 0.03MATIC You can create a fundme in less than 30 seconds,you just need to compile the form that require a title,description,goal and section of the fundme and then you share the link,simple as that!why does the markets needs us?for two main problems related to fundraisers platforms:high commissions (unlike us which are equal to 0)the waiting times to create a fundme which can even reach the days (but which is not necessary for us since everything is decentralized, it will take you 30 seconds!)platform: https://flashare.app/instagram: https://www.instagram.com/flashareapp/Twitter: https://twitter.com/AppFlasharewe even have a NFT collection that document the project day after day since went online,it is currently located on Opensea under the name of HistoryFlashare. (every offer will be accepted for improving the platform)https://opensea.io/collection/flashareFOR ANY QUESTION REACH OUT TO US ON SOCIALS

comments.author: disconnectme
comments.body: The thing I do not understand is why this project needs a token, people still do not understand that it is not every idea in the crypto space/ blockchain needs tokens for it to function very well, just look at Opensea, it is one of the most profitable projects in the space and has no tokens. Yes, Gofundme on the blockchain, lets people raise money and take a cut, why do they need to hold the token to use this platform, I don't get it

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: disconnectme on March 15, 2023, 02:45:34 PMThe thing I do not understand is why this project needs a token, people still do not understand that it is not every idea in the crypto space/ blockchain needs tokens for it to function very well, just look at Opensea, it is one of the most profitable projects in the space and has no tokens. Yes, Gofundme on the blockchain, lets people raise money and take a cut, why do they need to hold the token to use this platform, I don't get itIt really doesn't and it seems like money grab to me. If i want to fund someone, first thing i am checking out would be that i am not going to be funding some token pyramid scam that's riding on the sob stories, monetizing good will and lack of technical knowledge. Without any token this would make sense. Now it just doesn't and gives signals of greedy devs trying to sell an idea for a pointless token.
